pageTitle: Lost, stolen or damaged Oyster photocard

breadcrumbs.title: Lost, stolen or damaged Oyster photocard

title.title: Lost, stolen or damaged Oyster photocard

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can replace your 5-10, 11-15, 16+, 18+ Student, Apprentice, 60+ or Veterans Oyster photocard for £10 if it's lost, stolen or damaged."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
A damaged card could be cracked, scratched or bent.
We will transfer any pay as you go credit or ticket to your replacement photocard. If we can't transfer your credit or ticket, we might refund you instead.
While you are waiting for the replacement card to arrive, you will need to pay for your travel. You can't get free or discounted travel, or a refund of fares paid, while waiting for your new card.
You need to pay a £10 admin fee to get your old photocard cancelled and a new one sent to you.
